name: Lepton EDA release 1.9.18-20220529
body:
We are pleased to announce Lepton EDA release **1.9.18**.

We encourage you to test this release and provide feedback either
to [our issue tracker](https://github.com/lepton-eda/lepton-eda/issues) or to the [geda-user mailing list](mailto:geda-user@delorie.com).

For more info on this release, please read the [full NEWS](https://github.com/lepton-eda/lepton-eda/blob/master/NEWS.md).

body:

We encourage you to test this unstable release and provide feedback either to our issue tracker or to the *geda-user* mailing list.
For more info on this release, please read the full release notes.

name: Lepton EDA release 1.9.3
body:
We are pleased to announce Lepton EDA release 1.9.3.

We encourage you to test this release and provide feedback either to [our issue tracker](https://github.com/lepton-eda/lepton-eda/issues) or to the [geda-user mailing list](mailto:geda-user@delorie.com).

This is an unstable release, and the tools in Lepton EDA have not been renamed yet, so they will conflict with `geda-gaf` installation.

For more info on this release, please read the [full release notes](https://github.com/lepton-eda/lepton-eda/blob/1.9.3-20170226/NEWS.md).
